title: Fabulously Fit Moms: Lower Body Burn - Featuring Jennifer Nicole Lee
description: Tighten, tone and strengthen below the waist with a sculpting workout that will melt inches off your legs, buns and glutes. Jennifer Nicole Lees signature moves such as "Plié Zip Up" and "Starburst Lunges" will effectively transform your lower body.

As featured on Oprah, Jennifer Nicole Lees success story has inspired countless women to get in shape. After the birth of her second child, Jennifers weight reached nearly 200 pounds. Her determination to be healthy and fit led her to lose 80 pounds and go on to become one of the hottest fitness spokespersons today.
A Fit Global LLC ProductionCreated by Andrew Freirich and Jennifer Nicole LeeProduced and Directed by Andrew Freirich
